ygData.subject: Re: Bracer of Erollissi (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve had the Bracer of Erollissi for several weeks. It was AC5 when I got it. Got a pair of lionskin gloves as a gift from Sylly a couple weeks ago. They
ygData.messageBody:
I've had the Bracer of Erollissi for several weeks. It was AC5 when I got
it.

Got a pair of lionskin gloves as a gift from Sylly a couple weeks ago. They
didn't have and special abilities then, just AC5. Have to check them again.
Thanks for the info!

Operaman

----- Original Message -----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 5:15 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Bracer of Erollissi (OT)


> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> Did the Bracer of Erollissi change in stats? I could have sworn it used
to
> be AC2 but now its AC5. Anything other items of note change besides
> Lionskin gloves getting a ho-hum +2 resistance vs. cold bonus? For the
10pp
> plus HQ Lion skin they require these things are a joke.
>
> Kitasi
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
